title: A surprising performance boost! - AlphaCool @ Computex 2023
description: Thanks to Secretlab for sponsoring today's video! Check them out at   Alphacool is here at Computex with some creative cooling solutions. From metal fans to custom 3D-scanned watercooling setups, Alex stopped by to check it all out and see if any of these could end up in your next PC.  Check out some of Alphacool's current products: Eisbaer Aurora AIO 360mm CPU Cooler:  Eisfuegel Flow Indicator:  Susurro 120mm Fan:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 We love happy accidents 0:14 AlphaCool Metal Fan 2:21 Carbon fiber 4090 waterblock 2:57 Sponsor - Secretlab 3:29 Core 1 CPU cooler 5:09 Apex Pro Skeleton case 5:42 More upcoming watercooling features 6:51 Un-named watercooling prototype 8:01 3D-scanned server setups 8:27 Outro
